item.description: Join us Sunday, February 5th to watch the Super Bowl: The New England Patriots vs The New York Giants. Please arrive between 5:15 p.m. and the 6:20 p.m. game time. Feel free to invite your friends, and include them in your RSVP count. Let’s have a great time, and bring some food or refreshments to share with everyone. (Appetizers, chili, lasagna, chicken wings, drinks, desserts – whatever you’d like to bring.) We hope to see you. Let’s go Pats!   If you get lost, call 603-312-6735
item.how_to_find_us: Cross-street for GPS is 47 Ledgeview Drive, Rochester NH 03839

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Rochester, NH: Super Bowl Viewing Party - Patriots vs Giants
